entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 March 2023
